alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:07PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 345 PM MST... At 307 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Florence, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence Junction and Queen Valley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 209 and 218. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 138 and 150. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Superior
